string.text: I heard the call. The call from the centre of the Zone. I have to go there and find its source.
The voice is calling out to me. It has to be the Wish Granter. It has to be somewhere under the Sarcophagus. I have to find it.
You need to find the main base of the Monolith, which is mentioned in the documents, and find out what they are trying to hide.
Destroy the Monolith: destroy 10 waves of psi-projections created by the Monolith.
Disable the generators that ensure the functioning of autoclaves C-Consciousness.
